text.name: Tsuru-giri [鶴斬り]
text.desc: [WhenUse] If the other Skill in the same Skill Slot is a different Skill, [Discard] that Skill

text.name: Tsuru-giri [鶴斬り]
text.desc:
[WhenUse] If the other Skill in the same Skill Slot is a different Skill, [Discard] that Skill
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] If target has 6+ ([Vibration] + [[Sinking]]), Coin Power +1

text.name: Tsuru-giri [鶴斬り]
text.desc:
[WhenUse] If the other Skill in the same Skill Slot is a different Skill, [Discard] that Skill
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 6 ([Vibration] + [[Sinking]]) on target (max 2)

text.name: Sakura-sen [桜閃]
text.desc:
Deal +5% damage for every [HanafudaCombo] Potency on self
[WhenUse] If the other Skill in the same Skill Slot is a different Skill, [Discard] that Skill
[WhenUse] If target has 6+ ([Vibration] + [[Sinking]]), Coin Power +1
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] If target isn't in an [Switch_Vibration] state, trigger [Switch_Vibration] into [VibrationCollapse]

text.name: Sakura-sen [桜閃]
text.desc:
Deal +<style="highlight">10% damage for every [HanafudaCombo] Potency on self
[WhenUse] If the other Skill in the same Skill Slot is a different Skill, [Discard] that Skill
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 6 ([Vibration] + [[Sinking]]), on target (max 3)
coinDescs: <style="highlight"> If target is in either [Switch_Vibration] or [FusionVibration] states, this Coin deals +48% damage
[OnSucceedAttack] If target isn't in an [Switch_Vibration] state, trigger [Switch_Vibration] into [VibrationCollapse]<style="highlight">

text.name: Kōzan [光斬]
text.desc:
[CantDuel]
This Skill does not trigger Defense Skills, and external effects cannot trigger this Skill to be Reused

[WhenUse] At less than 3 [HanafudaCombo] Potency, cancel the Skill and gain 2 [Enhancement] next turn
[WhenUse] At 3+ [HanafudaCombo] Potency, gain the following effects based on Potency:
- Per 1 Potency: this Skill deals +10% damage
- At 4+ Potency: Base Power +1
- At 5 Potency: On Hit with the final Reuse Coin, trigger [VibrationExplosion] 2 times; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1
[EndSkillAll] Lose [HanafudaCombo] on self
[EndSkillAll] Next turn, convert the Suit in this unit's Hand to a random Suit that corresponds to one of this unit's Base Attack Skills (once per turn)
[EndSkillAll] Gain [HanafudaCombo] Potency next turn equal to the # of Coins that weren't used
coinDescs: Reuse this Coin ([HanafudaCombo] Potency - 1) times (4 times max)

text.name: Kōzan [光斬]
text.desc:
[CantDuel]
This Skill does not trigger Defense Skills, and external effects cannot trigger this Skill to be Reused

[WhenUse] At less than 3 [HanafudaCombo] Potency, cancel the Skill and gain 2 [Enhancement] next turn
[WhenUse] At 3+ [HanafudaCombo] Potency, gain the following effects based on Potency:
- Per 1 Potency: this Skill deals +10% damage
- At 4+ Potency: Base Power +1
- At 5 Potency: On Hit with the final Reuse Coin, trigger [VibrationExplosion] 2 times; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1
[EndSkillAll] Lose [HanafudaCombo] on self
[EndSkillAll] Next turn, convert the Suit in this unit's Hand to a random Suit that corresponds to one of this unit's Base Attack Skills (once per turn)
[EndSkillAll] Gain [HanafudaCombo] Potency next turn equal to the # of Coins that weren't used<style="highlight">
coinDescs: Reuse this Coin ([HanafudaCombo] Potency - 1) times (4 times max)<style="highlight">

text.name: Shuffle Hands - Floral Deck
text.desc:
[DuelCounter]
[StartBattle] [Discard] 2 Skills of the lowest rank in all of this unit's Skill Slots (once per turn)
[StartBattle] If this Skill was equipped on this unit's leftmost Skill Slot, convert the Suit in this unit's Hand to a random Suit that corresponds to one of this unit's Base Attack Skills next turn. (once per turn; excluding the Suit already in this unit's Hand)

text.name: Shuffle Hands - Floral Deck
text.desc:
[DuelCounter]
[StartBattle] [Discard] 2 Skills of the lowest rank in all of this unit's Skill Slots (once per turn)
[StartBattle] If this Skill was equipped on this unit's leftmost Skill Slot, convert the Suit in this unit's Hand to a random Suit that corresponds to one of this unit's Base Attack Skills next turn. (once per turn; excluding the Suit already in this unit's Hand)
<style="highlight">[StartBattle] 50% chance to gain 1 [HanafudaCombo] Potency (once per turn)
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 2 [HanafudaCombo] Potency on self (max 2)

1081321.name: Relay
1081321.desc: Combat Start: when 1 ally with the least SP uses a Base Attack Skill to Heads Hit, it heals 5 SP (2 times per turn; excluding allies at -40 or lower SP)

1081301.name: Stacking the Deck
1081301.desc:
On Tails Hit, heal 5 SP (once per turn)
Deal +10% damage against targets in either Low Morale or Panic states

1081302.name: Koi-Koi [こいこい]
1081302.desc:
Turn Start: if this unit does not have [HanafudaCombo], gain 0 [HanafudaCombo] Potency and 3 [HanafudaCombo] Count

Turn Start: if this unit does not have a Suit in Hand, gain a random Suit([HanafudaOne], [HanafudaTwo], or [HanafudaThree]) that corresponds to a Base Attack Skill on this unit's leftmost Skill Slot

Combat Start: when this unit uses a Base Attack Skill or an E.G.O Skill equipped on its leftmost Skill Slot, activate the following (once per turn):
- Next turn, convert the Hand on self to the one corresponding to the used Skill's Affinity
- If the Skill was either "Sakura-sen" or an E.G.O Skill, gain 1 [HanafudaCombo] Potency
- If the Skill's Affinity matches the Affinity on the current Hand's description(thus "forming a Hand"), activate the following:
  · Gain 1 [HanafudaCombo] Potency
  · If this unit formed a Hand last turn and this turn in succession, gain 1 [HanafudaCombo] Potency
  · On Hit with the said Skill: trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1
  · 25% chance to gain 1 E.G.O Resource corresponding to the Skill's Affinity
- At the Skill's Skill End: at 5 [HanafudaCombo] Potency, or at 0 [HanafudaCombo] Count, use "Kōzan"
